name: claymation
prompt: Convert the input selfie into an Aardman clay stop-motion character in the Wallace & Gromit style. Identity lock: keep the person's likeness—same face shape, hair color/style, accessories—translated into clay. Forms: rounded head and cheeks; big sausage nose; wide hinged smile with square block teeth (slight overbite); flat oval eyes with tiny dot pupils and simple eyelids; disc ears; soft, chunky limbs and mitten-like hands. Materials: matte Plasticine skin with subtle fingerprints, thumb dents, and seam joins; brows/hair as rolled clay strips; clothing in knit/tweed/corduroy with chunky handmade feel. Palette: warm earthy pastels (cream, moss green, tan, brick red) with gentle contrast. Lighting: soft diffused studio light, mild shadows, no glossy speculars. Background: neutral warm-cream or soft-grey backdrop (or a cozy workshop corner), uncluttered. Expression/pose: cheerful, slightly awkward—open-palm wave or friendly grin. Quality: tactile stop-motion look; handmade imperfections preserved; avoid CG polish.

name: french
prompt: Convert the input selfie into a hand-drawn French caricature animation in the style of Triplets of Belleville. Identity lock: preserve face, hair color/style, skin tone, and key accessories, but caricature the features. Anatomy: elongated head; prominent long nose; narrow droopy eyelids with tiny pupils; subtle under-eye bags; slightly jutting jaw/chin; hunched shoulder line; thin arms with large hands. Line & render: wiry scratchy inks with variable weight; loose contour lines; a little cross-hatching; flat fills plus light watercolor wash shadows; edges a bit wobbly. Palette: sepia/olive/mustard/rust with dusty teal accents; aged paper grain and mild speckle. Lighting: soft overcast; low contrast; no speculars. Background: neutral warm paper backdrop with faint vignette; no props or scenery. Mood: wry, nostalgic; slight side-eye or weary smile. Quality: vintage poster feel; avoid CG polish.

name: puppet
prompt: Convert the input selfie into a hand-made stop-motion puppet portrait. Identity lock: keep the person's face shape, skin tone base, hair style/color, accessories, and outfit silhouette—translate them into puppet materials. Materials: foam-latex/silicone skin with painted mottling and light scuffs; faint seam lines and tiny thumb dents; resin/acrylic dome eyes with crisp white specular; matte lips; fiber or felt hair strands; miniature cotton/linen shirt with visible stitches and slight wrinkling. Lighting & lens: warm tungsten key with subtle cool fill; soft bounce; shallow depth of field; mild vignette; a little set dust for scale. Palette: sun-faded teals, ochres, warm browns; cozy, low-contrast grade. Background (diorama): wood paneling, small bedside table, optional fan; Puerto Rico flag on wall; keep uncluttered and in soft focus. Mood/pose: friendly mid-gesture (small wave), head tilt; gentle handmade imperfection. Quality: tactile stop-motion; no glossy CG polish. Negative cues: photoreal pores, PBR plastic shine, perfect fabrics, heavy bloom/DOF, neon colors, anime eye sparkles, ultra-clean surfaces.

name: coquipuppet
prompt: Convert the input selfie into a hand-made stop-motion coquí frog puppet. Identity lock: preserve outfit colors/patterns and accessories; translate hairstyle into a small felt tuft or color accent; keep jewelry as mini props. Puppet skin (important): painted latex/urethane rubber in golden-ochre with mottled darker speckles; semi-gloss clear-coat with visible brush strokes, slight varnish pooling at creases, tiny handling scuffs, micro nicks, faint seam lines and glue residue at joins; low-roughness specular hotspots (not matte felt). Eyes: acrylic/resin dome eyes with hard white specular and light micro-scratches; simple eyelids. Body/wardrobe: miniature cotton/linen shirt with chunky stitches and bunched hems; felt/thread trims. Lighting & lens: small hard tungsten key (to pop tight speculars) + soft warm fill; cozy low-contrast grade; shallow DOF, mild vignette; a bit of set dust for scale. Background (diorama): wood paneling, small bedside table/fan, Puerto Rico flag on wall, softly out of focus. Pose/mood: friendly wave, slight head tilt; charming handmade imperfections. Quality: tactile stop-motion craft; no CG polish. Negative cues: felt/fleece/plush skin, powdery matte surface, PBR metal shine, photoreal pores, neon colors, anime eye sparkles, overly clean/new surfaces, heavy bloom/DOF.

name: antiquepuppet
prompt: Convert the input selfie into an antique marionette theatre puppet. Identity lock: preserve the person's recognisable traits (face shape, hair color/style, accessories) but translate them into carved-puppet form. Head & skin: carved wood / papier-mâché with gesso undercoat and hand-painted finish; subtle cracks, chips, and brush marks; warm varnish sheen (not plastic); glassy painted eyes with a tiny specular. Pronounced nose, rigid jawline/cheeks. Body & joints: narrow torso; hinged shoulders/elbows/wrists; stiff blocky hands/fingers. Attach fine strings from crown, shoulders, and wrists—visible and slightly taut. Hair/brows: painted or glued fiber/yarn, a bit uneven; waxed moustache/sideburns if applicable to the selfie. Costume: period brocade jacket or dress with lace ruff/cuffs, embroidered trims and medals—colors faded and a bit worn. Stage setting: wooden floorboards and a painted canvas backdrop (pastoral garden or stone arcade) with slight wrinkles and edge seams; soft curtain vignette. Lighting & grade: warm footlights plus cool side/top light; theatrical shadows; light 16 mm grain, gentle gate-weave/vignette, warm sepia bias. Mood/pose: formal three-quarter stance, one hand raised as if addressing the audience. Negative cues: photoreal human skin pores, silicone/latex puppet look, shiny PBR plastic, modern clothing/logos, CG lens flares, neon colors, soft beauty lighting, anime line art, perfectly smooth surfaces.

name: peanuts
prompt: Convert the input selfie into a hand-drawn newspaper-comic character in the classic Schulz/Peanuts style. Identity lock: preserve recognizable traits—hair color/part, skin tone, key accessories, and outfit colors/patterns—simplified into graphic shapes. Proportions: large round head, very small body with short tube limbs and big oval shoes. Face: dot eyes, tiny U-shaped nose, simple curved mouth (one or two lines), minimal brows; optional short hash-mark blush on cheeks; hair shown as a few squiggle lines or a clean outline. Linework: loose wobbly black ink with slight thickness variation; small cross-hatch accents; clean outer contour; no inner rendering. Color/rendering: flat fills only (no gradients or shading); limited cheerful palette. Background: plain pastel or cream paper with a light print grain and one simple ground line; uncluttered. Mood/pose: friendly, playful; slight head tilt or happy wave; clear silhouette. Quality: 2D newspaper-strip look; no 3D effects. Negative cues: 3D modeling, gradients, specular highlights, realistic skin/pores, anime gloss eyes, complex fabrics, photographic background, heavy shadows, vector-perfect lines.

name: antiquepuppetcreepy
prompt: Convert the input selfie into an antique marionette theatre puppet with an uncanny, time-worn, unsettling presence. Identity lock: preserve the person's recognisable traits (face shape, hair color/style, accessories) while translating them into carved-puppet form. Head & skin: carved wood / papier-mâché with gesso undercoat; spider-web hairline cracks, chipped paint at nose/chin, aged amber varnish that has pooled in creases; faint grime in recesses; asymmetric features (one brow higher, slight jaw misalignment). Eyes: glassy painted eyes, slightly mismatched size/alignment, pin-dot pupils; off-axis hard specular glint; faint crazing in the varnish; eyelids a little warped. Mouth: barely open hinged jaw with carved individual teeth; tiny gap showing darkness inside; lip paint rubbed thin at corners. Body & joints: narrow torso; creaky hinged shoulders/elbows/wrists with visible pins; stiff, blocky fingers; subtle splinters and worn edges. Attach fine, taut strings from crown, shoulders, and wrists; a couple of loose stray strands hanging. Hair/brows: painted or glued fiber/yarn, patchy and uneven; stray fibers catching the light. Costume: faded, threadbare brocade with yellowed lace ruff/cuffs; frayed hems, missing beads; tarnished medal. Stage setting: warped wood floorboards, torn painted canvas backdrop (water stains, wrinkles, nail holes), faint cobwebs; curtain edges crowd the frame. Lighting & grade: low-key footlights that flicker; narrow, cool top light carving deep eye sockets; long theatrical shadows; sepia-green cast (sickly); 16 mm grain, slight gate-weave, vignette; a little dust drifting in the beam. Mood/pose: frozen half-wave, head tilted too far, polite smile that doesn't reach the eyes; hold the stare. Negative cues: silicone/latex look, glossy PBR plastic, clean new costume, bright neon colors, soft beauty lighting, modern props/logos, photoreal human skin/pores, cartoon ink outlines, gore/blood, cute expressions.
